Docs.summary: 为可添加到 中的资源定义基类。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何向添加 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> 派生类型 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: 向文档包提交所有更改并刷新资源。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 根据和的设置 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy> （例如 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> 和）， <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder> 方法的刷新操作可能会 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> 延迟，直到整个 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 关闭。
## Examples 下面的示例演示在 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> 将资源添加到时如何使用派生类中的方法 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]
